"Not too long I'm afraid. I had just recently arrived."  She kept 
walking.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus::
> 
> Ramulus nods, taking the map.
> 
> "So, how long have you been on the planet?" he asks while walking.
